sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle rit joyeusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She laughs happily.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez lever la main pour répondre à la question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please raise your hand to answer the question.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion des parents aura lieu demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The parent meeting will be held tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait un peu froid aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's a little cold today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre coûte vingt yuans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book costs twenty yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天天气阴，可能会下雨。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tiānqì yīn, kěnéng huì xiàyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps est nuageux aujourd'hui, il pourrait pleuvoir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is cloudy today, it might rain.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 虽然他很忙，但还是来了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suīrán tā hěn máng, dàn háishì lái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bien qu'il soit très occupé, il est quand même venu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Although he is very busy, he still came.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天我请客，你不用付钱。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān wǒ qǐngkè, nǐ bùyòng fù qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui c'est moi qui invite, tu n'as pas besoin de payer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today I'm treating, you don't need to pay.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de yīfu zāng le, kuài qù xǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tes vêtements sont sales, va vite les laver.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your clothes are dirty, go wash them quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez répéter une fois de plus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please say it again.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La machine à laver est cassée, elle a besoin d'être réparée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The washing machine is broken, it needs to be repaired.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Toute la famille dîne ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The whole family has dinner together.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yè shēn le, gāi shuìjiào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nuit est avancée, il est temps de dormir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's late at night, time to sleep.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng kāi dēng, fángjiān tài àn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allume la lumière, la pièce est trop sombre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn on the light, the room is too dark.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn bǐ nà jiàn gèng hǎokàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Celui-ci est plus beau que celui-là.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This one looks better than that one.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai très mal au pied.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My foot hurts a lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège dōngxi yī kuài wǔ máo jiǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet article coûte un yuan et cinquante centimes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This thing costs one yuan and fifty cents.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle aime jouer au volleyball.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She likes to play volleyball.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les candidats attendent d'entrer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The examinees are waiting to enter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La mer est bleue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sea is blue.
